md:
giải nghĩa từ "superb" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Superb (adjective)
	+ Meaning: Extremely good or of very high quality.
	+ Vietnamese translation: Xuất sắc, tuyệt vời, vượt trội.
	+ Example sentence: The superb quality of the hotel's service impressed all the guests.
	+ Related words: excellent, outstanding, exceptional, magnificent.
	+ Antonyms: poor, mediocre, average.

* Superb (adverb)
	+ Meaning: Extremely well or to a very high degree.
	+ Vietnamese translation: Rất tốt, rất xuất sắc, rất tuyệt vời.
	+ Example sentence: She performed superbly in the final exam.
	+ Related words: extremely, exceptionally, outstandingly, magnificently.
	+ Antonyms: poorly, badly, inadequately.

Note: The word "superb" can be used as both an adjective and an adverb, depending on the context in which it is used.
html:

  • Superb (adjective)

    • Antonyms: poor, mediocre, average.

  • Superb (adverb)

    • Meaning: Extremely well or to a very high degree.
    • Vietnamese translation: Rất tốt, rất xuất sắc, rất tuyệt vời.
    • Example sentence: She performed superbly in the final exam.
    • Related words: extremely, exceptionally, outstandingly, magnificently.
    • Antonyms: poorly, badly, inadequately.

Note: The word "superb" can be used as both an adjective and an adverb, depending on the context in which it is used.
